name: Eilon Cohen
description: From a young age, I've always had a knack for breaking and building things. Whether it was taking apart toys to see how they worked, or constructing elaborate structures from building blocks, I was constantly driven by curiosity. This passion didn't fade as I grew older. Instead, it evolved into a dedication to solving complex problems and crafting innovative solutions. Today, as an experienced security expert, developer, and engineer, I wield that same curiosity and creativity to conquer new challenges and seize opportunities for growth.
